en.welcome_format: As-salamu alaykum, *{0}*! This bot was developed by members of the community [IT Muslim](it-muslim.com) and is designed to train [the conjugations of the Arabic verbs](http://alfarabinur.kz/arabskiyyazyk/9-urok-spryazhenie-glagolov.html).
